name: ENDLESS BLUE
description:
"While you frolicked in the red mist, I wallowed beneath the endless blue. Tell me, how is that fair?"

A classic survival horror adventure set in a mysterious underwater research facility. Inspired by 90's classics of the genre, this game aims to faithfully recreate not only the gameplay of the era, but the unique aesthetic vibe of 90's sci-fi horror.

Created for the Haunted PS1's Summer of Shivers Game Jam, this project was created in a month and a half. The result is just the introduction of what could be a much longer game - if you want to see more, let me know > @mattdivito

Keyboard + mouse controls / Xbox 360 compatible controller support.

Game is GPU heavy at higher framerates, I recommend setting a frame limit in the options menu if you are having issues.
